title: 116O.02 DEFINITIONS.
text:
The definitions in this section apply to sections 116O.01 to 116O.15.
"Account" means the Minnesota technology account.
"Board" means the board of directors of Enterprise Minnesota, Inc.
"Corporation" means Enterprise Minnesota, Inc.
[Renumbered subd 1a]
"Greater Minnesota" means the area of Minnesota located outside of the metropolitan area as defined in section 473.121, subdivision 2.
"Technology-related assistance" means the application and utilization of technological information and technologies to assist in the development and production of new technology-related products or services or to increase the productivity or otherwise enhance the production or delivery of existing products or services. "Technology-related assistance" includes assistance in utilizing and developing processes and products that conserve energy.
